txt.en: Your mission is to find and defeat Frost-caller Túgost.\n\nSpeak to Ausma to travel to Vorkodar.

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].\n\n'We have located a powerful hobgoblin in a cave in Elderslade. He appears to be one of their leaders, and a zealous follower of the dragon Hrímil Frost-heart. It is in our best interest to ambush him while he is in his den, before he can add his magic to the Orc army. I leave dispatching him to you!'
Complete Mission: Magic of the Frost-bound
DNT - 'When you are ready, my scouts will lead you to the Hobgoblin's lair. Good luck.'
'Well done! The hobgoblins are a formidable enemy, and when this battle finally comes to a head, I will be glad to have one less foul dragon-mage on the field!'
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Ausma for your reward!

The fearsome hobgoblins have sworn themselves to the Frost-horde, and gained terrible power in return….\n\nYour mission is to find and defeat Frost-caller Túgost, the hobgoblin zealot, inside Vorkodar.
You have been tasked with dispatching a powerful hobgoblin in Vorkodar.
The monster commander in this mission will attempt to summon blizzards.
